nodes.text: Azraj-Nug was an Ongree alive during the Cold War. Azraj-Nug was one of the Ongree who worshipped the teachings of Darth Revan. He was later killed by operatives of the reconstituted Sith Empire who had been sent to acquire the  Infinite Engine.
If the player decides to choose the dark side action, Azraj-Nug and the other Ongree slaves are killed, and the Infinite Engine is given to the Sith Empire.
